body_html: Also, afaict, sparseElementwiseKernelScalar in SparseCUDAApplyUtils.cuh doesn't work with dimV > 1. But it is called in add_out_dense_sparse_cuda when input is coalesced. I haven't checked if it gives correct results on dimV > 1. (It's definitely broken with noncontig I and V.)
body_text: Also, afaict, sparseElementwiseKernelScalar in SparseCUDAApplyUtils.cuh doesn't work with dimV > 1. But it is called in add_out_dense_sparse_cuda when input is coalesced. I haven't checked if it gives correct results on dimV > 1. (It's definitely broken with noncontig I and V.)
body: Also, afaict, `sparseElementwiseKernelScalar` in `SparseCUDAApplyUtils.cuh` doesn't work with `dimV > 1`. But it is called in `add_out_dense_sparse_cuda` when input is coalesced. I haven't checked if it gives correct results on `dimV > 1`. (It's definitely broken with noncontig I and V.)
